nodes.documentation:
Author: Raja Ramanathan
Lucky draw game. Anyone with account can draw to win weis. 
Game organizer need to close the game after it ends to claim the remaining balance.
nodes.name: LuckyDrawGame

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Need to be the game organizer"

arguments.value: Need to be the game organizer

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Need to be the game organizer"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only one open game per organizer."

arguments.value: Only one open game per organizer.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only one open game per organizer."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Game has no balance left to draw"

arguments.value: Game has no balance left to draw

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Game has no balance left to draw"

nodes.documentation:
A player is allowed to draw only when 
 game as not expired  and has balance
 player has not drawn before
nodes.name: isDrawAllowed

nodes.documentation:
CAUTION: PRNG is NOT safe to use for real or large bounties. 
Acceptable for demo and very small amounts.
nodes.name: pseudoRandomNumberGenerator

nodes.documentation:
bountyRange: Max range of the bounty 0.._bountyRange
 bountyWeiUnits: Wei units expressed in exponentials of 10. Eg: 12 for Szabo, 9 for shannon 
 durationInMinutes: for game to expire from now
nodes.name: start

nodes.documentation:
draw: Player should have enough gas to draw and earn bounty.
gameId: a game is uniquely identified by the address of the game owner.
nodes.name: draw

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "No balance on game to close."

arguments.value: No balance on game to close.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "No balance on game to close."

nodes.documentation: Game organizer can end the game anytime and get refund of the balance
nodes.name: end
